<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.CatalogDomainUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>CatalogDomainUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var CatalogDomainUtil = Class.create(); CatalogDomainUtil.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
isDomainIsolationEnabled: function() { return (gs.getProperty("glide.sys.domain.partitioning") == "true" || gs.getProperty("glide.sys.domain.delegated_administration") == "true") && gs.getProperty("com.glide.sc.domain_separation.enabled", "true") == "true" && GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.glideapp.servicecatalog.domain_separation"); },
type: 'CatalogDomainUtil' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>anurag.vesangi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-04 12:49:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2c977168c3403300f7c7758a7ff57ecf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CatalogDomainUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c977168c3403300f7c7758a7ff57ecf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>anurag.vesangi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-04 12:49:27</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
